hero.mainText: Your Loyalty Rewards, All Under One Roof.

features.title: Discover the Heartbeat of your rewards
features.subtitle: Features
features.allInOneHubDescription: Consolidate your points from multiple partners here, providing a comprehensive 360-degree view.
features.phoneNumberKey: Your Phone Number is the Key
features.phoneNumberKeyDescription: With your mobile number, you can perform a range of actions: register, transfer, and earn!
features.earnAndTransfer: Earn from All & Transfer to Any
features.earnAndTransferDescription: Effortlessly earn rewards from all registered partners and redeem them with any of them.
features.voucherFriendlyDescription: Generate and utilize valuable vouchers that are accepted by a wide range of partners.

discoverMagic: Discover the magic behind our product

step1.title: Register
step1.description: Register in one step by phone number

step3.title: View
step3.description: Have 360 view of registered partners points

aboutSection1.title: About..
aboutSection1.description: AlFursan members enjoy a world of benefits: reward tickets, lounge access, extra luggage, priority wait-listing, and more. Plus, as a Saudia SkyTeam member, you can earn and redeem miles globally. Explore offers from our exclusive partners, including SkyTeam airlines, banks, hotels, car rentals, and telecom, to boost your miles and enhance your AlFursan experience.

aboutSection2.title: How to gain points?
aboutSection2.description: Join AlFursan for exclusive rewards, lounge access, extra baggage, and faster holiday redemptions with Silver and Gold Tiers.

blog.blogDescription: In this pivotal stage of our process, we take your ideas and aspirations and weave them into a tapestry of innovation.

newsletter.joinNewsletter: Join Our Newsletter for Exclusive Insights!
